ygData.subject: Heritrix adds automatically new source seeds
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, My crawl job is based on the TextSourceModule which announces a list of seeds from a text source. This list is automatically modified by Heritrix: new

Hi,

My crawl job is based on the TextSourceModule which announces a list o=
f seeds from a text source. This list is automatically modified by Heritrix=
: new seeds are added. How can i desactivate this function ? I want to keep=
 my source seeds file clean.

Thanks

Romain
